QuestData.Title: In Defense of the King's Lands
QuestData.Description: We need to protect the Loch, $n! With so many of the King's soldiers fighting valiantly on remote battlefields, we've become overwhelmed on the home front. Troggs are tunneling up from every crevice! The trogg infestation poses the largest threat to Ironforge.$b$bWe need you, brave adventurer, to venture forth and lay waste to the trogg threat. Slay twelve Stonesplinter troggs and venture back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Stonesplinter Troggs or Stonesplinter Scouts.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n! You demonstrated uncanny courage on the battlefield. Our war against the Troggs will be won with efforts such as yours. You have served King Magni well.
